price: 5. There is indeed in them (the above oaths) sufficient proofs for men of understanding (and that, they should avoid all kinds of sins and disbeliefs)!
arabic: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: hal fī dhālika qasamun lidhī ḥij'rin
